CharacterGallery.HINT.selectionDetails: Click on an image in the grid to preview additional information about it here.
CharacterGallery.HINT.noDataFound:
No tags found in asset database.

Enable sources below to populate this list.

If sources are selected, there may be an issue with their mapping file!
CharacterGallery.TOOLTIP.replaceArtwork: Assign the selected artwork to the target actor.
CharacterGallery.TOOLTIP.createNew: Create new actor using this artwork
CharacterGallery.TOOLTIP.targetActor: The actor that is the current target of this application
CharacterGallery.FoundPart2: entries found to fit active filters.
CharacterGallery.ChangeImagePrompt1: You are about to change the portrait, token, and subject images for the actor {actorName}.
CharacterGallery.ErrorFailedToLoad: Failed to load datasheet "{datasheetId}" from module "{moduleId}"
CharacterGallery.Configure.Prompt1: Configure which available datasheets should be loaded by the art gallery.
CharacterGallery.Configure.Prompt2: GM users can also restrict certain sources from being loaded by players without sufficient permission.
CharacterGallery.Configure.HeaderEntriesHint: The number of unique entries in this datasheet
CharacterGallery.Configure.HeaderIncludeHint: If true, the datasheet's contents will be loaded by the gallery. Does not affect other users.
CharacterGallery.Configure.HeaderHideHint: If true, the datasheet will be hidden from players (this option is only available to GM users).
CharacterGallery.AccessHint: Sets a minimum user permission level required to access the gallery application.
CharacterGallery.ColorHint: Modify the color used to tint active tags in the filters or to highlight the selected entry in the grid, either for aesthetic preference or accessibility.
CharacterGallery.HeaderButtonHint: Show a button in the header bar of actor sheets to open the gallery application.
CharacterGallery.ActorTypeHint: The type used when creating a new actor from the Gallery application.
CharacterGallery.MenuDescription: Here you can configure the main settings for the Character Gallery.

Tags.category.label: Category
Tags.category.hint: Which category or blanket group the creature falls into
Tags.ancestry.label: Ancestry
Tags.equipment.label: Equipment
Tags.equipment.hint: Held weapons or other notable equipment.
Tags.family.label: Family
Tags.family.hint: Families that the subject belongs to or could be associated with
Tags.features.label: Features
Tags.special.label: Special
Tags.special.hint: Additional metadata regarding the artwork's format or subject.

tooltips.aquatic: This creature can navigate or breathe in waterlogged or submarine environments.
